short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put a picture of your choice in the extension area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a new icon to the extension area, and gives you the power to pick what the icon is.
You can simply pick an image, or open the editor.
The editor allows you to move, zoom, and mask the image.
The extension also supports drag & drop, plus pasting images.
